description: The file defines the main route component for a Tic Tac Toe game frontend built with Qwik. It manages game state, handles loading/saving game state from localStorage, and renders game UI including the Board and StatusBar components, along with game controls.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Main Qwik component function defining the Tic Tac Toe game interface and logic.

methods.name: head
methods.description: Metadata for the page including title and meta tags.
